dprocess.dpserver
Class DPSupervisor

java.lang.Object
  dprocess.dpserver.DPSupervisor

public class DPSupervisor
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the supervisor functionalities for a dynamic pool of threads.

Version:
1.0
See Also:
DPServer, DPServerThread

Constructor Detail

DPSupervisor

public DPSupervisor(int wStart)
Main constructor for the supervisor : - allocating starting threads - setting variables counters

Parameters:
wStart - : number of threads to start
Method Detail

startClient

public void startClient(java.net.Socket nC)
Accept of a new client has been made, affect a thread to it. Checks if there is enough threads left in the pool. If this is not the case, adds a new thread.

Parameters:
nC - : socket of the new client

endClient

public void endClient()
End of a client. Check if there is too much threads in the pool. If this is the case, interrupt one of them.
